name: MLImageClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData
desc: The source of a validation dataset for an image classifier.

items.name: case split(strategy: MLSplitStrategy)
items.desc: A validation dataset derived by randomly selecting a portion of the image classifierâ€™s training dataset using the split strategy.

items.name: case dataSource(MLImageClassifier.DataSource)
items.desc: A validation dataset represented by a data source.

items.name: case dictionary([String : [URL]])
items.desc: A validation dataset represented by a dictionary.

items.name: case none
items.desc: An empty validation dataset that skips the model validation phase after training.
